text: Tevha sapatha ahe tumacya palanakartyaci, he loka (toparyanta) imanadharaka ho'u sakata nahi, joparyanta sarva apasatila matabhedata tumhala n'yaya-nivada karanara svikarita nahi, maga jo phaisala tumhi karala, tyavara manatuna narajahi nasaveta ani ajnadharakapramane tyanni to man'ya karuna ghyava
